name: Batch Beam SQL
description: An Apache Beam streaming pipeline that reads XML encoded messages, uses Beam SQL to transform the message data, and writes the results to a BigQuery

parameters.name: outputTableSpec
parameters.label: BigQuery output table
parameters.helpText: BigQuery table spec to write the output to in the format 'project:dataset.table'.

parameters.name: deadLetterTableSpec
parameters.label: BigQuery output table
parameters.helpText: BigQuery table spec to write the dead letter output to in the format 'project:dataset.table'.
